Name: GRANDIA II HD Remaster
About the game: Pick up your Geoblade and take up the fight against evil once more in GRANDIA II HD Remaster! Take on the role of a hardened mercenary with a heart and go on an epic adventure filled with magic, new friendships, and surprising storyline twists in search of a weapon once wielded by a deity. Experience the classic tale of a band of adventurers destined to save the world, but things are not always as they seem... GRANDIA II is famous for its great characters, mature storytelling, memorable music and fantastic battle system. There is no better way to experience one of the most beloved console RPGs of the 32-bit era than with this HD Remaster! GRANDIA II HD Remaster features: Enhanced textures, lighting, and shadows Original Japanese audio Choose from Normal or Hard Mode Steam cards and Achievements Steam Cloud Save Support Gamepad and keyboard support with remappable controls Selectable video options 100 save file slots Dreamcast VMS Save File Support
Developers: GAME ARTS Co., Ltd.,Sickhead Games, LLC
